title: TOYS: Crash Arena
summary:
Do you like cars? And what about tanks? Maybe you love building toy blocks? Well, welcome to the TOYS: Crash Arena!

In this game, you can create your perfect ultimate vehicle from constructor kits, bricks, & blocks. You can also select all kinds of weapons. You can make whatever you want & join the gas rumble!

HOW TO PLAY
This is a fighting game between toy cars. So obviously, the first thing you have to do is to create your tank. You need to design it from the parts you have.
At the core of your tank, there is an engine. If it gets destroyed, you will lose the fight, so cover it with armor well. Use constructor blocks from different materials, starting from simple wood & going all over to armored metal bricks. You can even add TNT blocks so it would blow another player on touch! But be careful - the big boom can damage your car as well!
You also have to think about how your car will move: will it be wheels of different sizes or giant turbo jet engines that allow you to fly & hover above the arena?
But it's not all about the tank itself. Don't forget about toy weapons, both for range & close combat:
Crush hammer or robot drill will be a good choice if you want to get up close.
Rocket launcher or shotgun are perfect for dealing damage from afar! Or do you like laser weapons and missiles?
But you don't have to select only one type of weapon. You can choose & mix everything you want! The only limit is your imagination and the amount of parts you have in your hangar.
But what if you don't have enough parts to create your dream tank? Well, you start the fight anyways! Because if you win - you get crates with new construction kits!

HOW TO FIGHT
You spawn on the arena with your opponent on the other side. The controls are simple - just touch the left part of the screen to move to the left, and the right part of the screen to drive to the right. The shooting is automatic, just get in range of your opponent. If he gets too close - he will be hit with your melee weapons.
Of course, you have HP points. It is based on the amount of blocks you have attached to your fighting tank. You think the more the better? Well, not at all! The more parts your battle car has, the less manoeuvrable it becomes. And it's all about strategy, tactics & timing skills. Drive carefully! Don't attack when it's too dangerous, control the space. Think before you act - and you will be able to win even when you are at the disadvantage. It's like a puzzle.
But what if you don't want to play the game? Let's say you are really tired and want only to have fun & relax a little. Well, we thought about it - and you can just select the auto battle feature. It will do everything for you, and you can just enjoy an epic, action packed shooter cartoon. Isn't that cool?
After you finish the battle - you get your rewards! Some money, some coins, some better gear & parts for you to upgrade. And you will want to upgrade the parts you have attached to your tank! Opponents will become stronger with each round. To upgrade the parts, just go to the upgrade menu & merge the same parts!
If you failed a battle, don't get upset! You can change your combat tank at any time. Go to the hangar and start the customization! Don't be afraid to create some crazy builds! Craft anything you like! Whacky physics will be on your side! It's all about fun in the end, isn't it?

GAME FEATURES
- Easy and intuitive gameplay for everyone
- Build cars brick by brick
- Awesome 3D graphics
- Simple controls
- Intuitive interface
Be a chief engineer: design, construct & improve the ultimate battle car! Discover crazy weapons, gadgets & spare parts! Try to outsmart your opponent!
Fight against real player constructions until you reach the top of the battle rating & become the star! Race your opponents to the top of the leaderboard, & show them who's the boss! Build your rover tank, and unleash its power in this stylish TOYS game! What are you waiting for? Download TOYS: Crash Arena right now for free!

In a tall runner queue, swipe left and right to stack your boxes.

Sadly, not collecting enough gifts, or losing many of them through the enemy, will surely make the peak unreachable. So make sure not to skip any box!

You can always track the toy-making process on the factory wall screens where you can check out the number of products, the speed of the process, and the kind of toys in the making: Tracks, excavators, dolls, balls, drams and many others that are waiting to be packed and offered to customers.

You can upgrade your factory with your money. So get your money from the Run, and use it to update the machines so that you earn more money by selling the toy gifts you make. Also achieving higher levels will speed up the course, making it faster for you to earn more cash rewards, and even double and multiply your money.

title: Banquet for a King
summary:
"Congratulations! You have the honor of becoming the personal servant of the illustrious King Roden (That would be me!) As my attendant it is your task to feed me by maneuvering the machine for the Royal meal!
Hit the food by operating your fist and send it straight into my imperial jaws! You're hired under test, so I'll give you two mistakes at most, after which I'll have you imprisoned and rotted in the cell for the rest of your life! Bwahahah!!! "

Well, it seems easy, right? Wait for the rotating table to set, and when the food is in front of you, touch the phone screen! Of course, there is always something unexpected in this work, for example sometimes the table rotates too quickly, or some assassin hired by King Kitten has exchanged some chicken thigh with explosive bombs ... Or someone turned off the light during the banquet ... But the harder obstacle is surely the talk of King Roden: can you bear it without punching his face? I bet no!

title: AntiStress
summary:
AntiStress ‚Äì use conscious breathing and assess your stress level

AntiStress helps you deal with everyday stress. An audio guide teaches you conscious breathing, which research has shown can reduce stress and increase your well-being. To help you begin to understand your stress levels, the app allows you to make daily notes about what saps or boosts your energy and your perceived stress level. These notes are kept in your personal diary on your smartphone.

How can listening to AntiStress help me?
When we are stressed, we automatically breathe shallower and faster. If we consciously breathe more calmly and deeper, it sends signals to the brain which reduce stress. Try to practise AntiStress every day. Using the method regularly can help to manage thoughts and feelings that might otherwise prevent you from having a sense of well-being. Give yourself time and patience. The AntiStress self-care programme is designed to prevent and reduce stress. AntiStress should be seen as a complement to other care programmes that reduce the amount of stress in your life. If you have serious stress-related problems, it is important that you contact your healthcare centre.

The AntiStress app is produced by the Research and Development Unit at Primary care Fyrbodal, Region V√§stra G√∂taland. Research in several fields of medicine have been used in its development by Tina Arvidsdotter, PhD in Health Sciences.

- New fusion of finding hidden objects and Match 3 games, with satisfying 3D life-like simulations.
- Train your brain through thousands of matching puzzles. Start with simple and easy puzzles and advance through the hardest puzzles.
- Mystery Chests and Card Collection: Find rare Cards to complete your collection and buff.
- Relax and have fun at your own pace: Take your time to solve the puzzles. The game auto-saves your progress so you can pause and come back anytime.

title: Tower Defense PvP:Tower Royale
summary:
Build your strong deck of towers, blow down the rush of enemies, and earn the most trophies!

‚ñ† Meet the Variety of Towers
You can meet 50 kinds of towers in Tower Royale. Each has a special ability and power. You have a tower like Archer, Random, and Legend Tower. Look closely into each of them, compose your strategy to win, and build the best deck out of your tower pool. You can also prepare multiple decks. Make one for PvP battle where you clash with other users and another for tower defense where you have to stop a rush of enemies and defend your castle. Yet, beware that you randomly summon towers as if you roll dice in Battle or Royale Mode.

‚ñ† Battle Mode
Tower Royale's Battle Mode is a PvP mode where you can experience the ultimate clash of tower defense. Summon random towers and defend your castle from enemies' rush. Destroy them and get the souls to summon more towers. Then merge towers to upgrade them. Like a dice, every tower has spots, and you can combine towers that have the same spots. Enemies killed will re-appear on the opponent's side, so be quick to make your tower stronger and crash enemies faster than your opponent to crash the castle. Also, be aware of the boss raid. Upgrade your towers in advance and use the castle's ability to defeat the boss. An abundant reward awaits the intense battle! Earn trophies and tier up! Collect gold and gems and own rare and legendary towers.

‚ñ† Royale Mode
Royale Mode has two modes: Co-op Mode and Mirror Mode.

„ÉªCo-op Mode lets you experience a co-op tower defense game. You can team up with your friend, a clan member, or a random match, and together you guard the royale road and the castle from the rush of enemy waves. Same as Battle Mode, you need to destroy as many enemies as possible, summon more towers, and complete the tower defense mission. Yet the enemies also become stronger as the rush goes on. Tower defense will get harder but stay together with your partner, stop more waves, and claim you are at the top of TD!

„ÉªMirror Mode is the ultimate random PvP mode. The same, but a random deck and castle are given to you and your opponent. You get to play with the towers you do not have and challenge how well you can play with what is randomly given. It may feel like rolling a dice, but it actually takes your wisdom to plan a spontaneous strategy with the random deck in your hand so you can win this PvP match. Experience the epic random clash of TD!

‚ñ† Battle Arena
Tower Royale allows you to compete with other users and feel the thrill of going up to the top of the ranking. Clash with your opponents on a PvP mode, crash them, and earn trophies. Or co-op with others, impede the enemy rush, clash with the boss, and earn as many points. Then show off your trophy points on Battle Arena and tell your friends how far you are up on its daily and monthly ranking.

‚ñ† Daily Market & Quest
Meet the daily offers in the market and obtain rewards by completing the daily quest. As regular training makes a human stronger, everyday participation in the tower defense will award you with items that enlarge your TD experience on Tower Royale. Clear the daily quest and get items from the market to prepare for a new clash of tower defense.

‚ñ† Create Your Clan
Gather your friends and partners to build a clan. TD friends can give you ideas for new strategies for successful tower defense. You can also clash against your clan members and practice for a real-time battle. You can simply join a clan and learn from the experienced TD users of Tower Royale.

Are you looking for an addicting tower defense game? Tower Royale is here for you! Play real-time PvP and compete against opponents with your TD deck. Play Royale Mode and get fun you can't find from simple dice rolling or clash of soldiers.

Now it is time to enter the mighty world of TD and engage in the real-time PvP battles! Wish you the best of luck all you TD lovers! üéñ
